original_title: 那件瘋狂的小事叫愛情
overview: I Love That Crazy Little Thing is a 2016 Chinese romantic comedy film directed by Snow Zou and starring William Chan, Tang Yixin and Jessica Jung.[2] It was released in China by EMP Distribution (Beijing) and Wanda Shengshi Film Distribution on August 12, 2016
title: I Love That Crazy Little Thing
